customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PORTABLE CHARGER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is amazing! I can now recharge my iPhone 7+ in no time at all. Blazing speed fast! I’m so happy I purchased this. I have another Belkin with lower mAh’s & the difference in recharge time is phenomenal. I think the only faster charger is Belkins model above this one. This was one of the best investments I have ever made with regard to smartphone accessories & portable chargers. Don’t hesitate to bring this one home! The recharging time of this Belkin unit, itself, is very fast, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Battery Pack
customer_reviews.text: I live on my phone and need a good reliable power supply I can carry with me, the 15,000mAh Power Bank does the job and more. Note: I use a 6 inch high quality USB cable for charging, the shorter the cable the better. Cables do not last forever so I order then 3 or 4 at a time and will trash one as soon as it slows down.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy though. I plugged an ipad and Samsung 8 at the same time and both were charging. With the adapter, my s8 usually takes about 1 hour 40 minutes to be fully charged. Plugged in this battery, my phone informed me that it would take 2 hours and 50 minutes to be fully charged, which is pretty good. There are 4 tiny dots on the side to indicate how much battery I have left. As soon as I plugged my phone into the battery, it charged automatically without the need to turn it on. I have that problem with another power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Loann N.

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine back in February. Worked fine until today (9/2/19). It now won't charge. It lasted and worked far longer than any other device on the market, but sadly still has what I consider an unsatisfactory use life at just under 7 months. For the price it should last years, not months. Very disappointed. Bought a second one- it lasted not even 90 days. Not buying another.

product_meta.title: Belkin Pocket Power 15,000mAh Durable Ultra Slim Portable Charger / Power Bank / Battery Pack (Black)
product_meta.description: Get the most out of your devices. The 15,000 mAh Pocket Power bank can recharge a smartphone up to 5 times. Inside this compact design are lightweight and efficient polymer battery cells for easy, portable transport in a bag or pocket. Two universal USB A ports delivers up to 3.4A of total power, quickly and safely charging smartphones, smartwatches, fitness bands, headphones, speakers, action cameras, Bluetooth enabled devices, and even small drones. A 2.0A input promptly recharges the power bank between uses, so you won’t ever run low.
feature_bullets: Powerful enough to recharge a smartphone up to 5 times on the go
Dual ports charge 2 devices quickly and simultaneously
Slim, lightweight design creates ultimate freedom and portability
A 2,500 dollars Connected Equipment Warranty provides a reassuring guarantee for the safety of your device
The Belkin Difference: Pioneer in technology and innovation for over 30 years
NOTE: Refer user manual before use
